title: EVERSECU 5 in 1 CCTV Tester Support Upt to 4K IP Camera & 720P/1080P/3mp/4mp/5 Megapixel AHD, TVI, CVI & CVBS Analog Camera, Security Video Monitor with 4" Touch Screen, POE Out, WiFi Test, PTZ Test
features: 5 In 1 Tester Support Up to 8MP TVI/4MP CVI/5MP AHD Cameras test, Support H.265 & H .264 Up to 4K IP Camera test, Support CVBS camera test and PTZ control,

Rapid Network camera test, Auto log in and display image, create testing report, Support third parity camera test, enter IP Camera test app, input username and password to test, With IPC TEST, HIK test tool, DH test tool,IP discovery, just by one key to detect all network cameras IP address,Rapid video, just by one key to detect all network cameras and auto display

DC12V 3A power output, PoE DC48V power output, Max power 24W, support 10/100/1000M Ethernet test, network state and traffic display, PING test, IP address scan, port flashing etc, With Audio in, support record and save the audio/LED lamp, calculators, music players and other application tools
4 inch touch screen, 800*480 resolutions, Wrist design, portable and easier to carry, 7.4 V /2400mAh Lithium Ion Polymer Battery, after 4~5 hours charging, working time lasts about 8 hours
description: Product Description 4K IP Cameras and HD Analog CCTV Cameras Tester ● 4-inch touch screen, 800*480 resolution ● H.265 & H .264 IP, 4K video display via mainstream ● Rapid Network Camera Testing, Auto log in and display image, create testing report ● Support multi-brand cameras test, enter IPC Test app, input username and password to test ● 8MP TVI/8MP CVI/8MP AHD camera test ● CVBS camera test and PTZ control Multifunctional Touch Screen Security Cameras Tester Monitor ● IPC TEST, HIK test tool, DH test tool ● IP discovery, just by one key to detect all network camera's IP address ● Rapid video, just by one key to detect all network cameras and auto display ● DC 12V 3A power output ● PoE DC48V power output, Max power 25.5W ● Innovative coaxial HD focus, video signal quality test ● Built-in WiFi, display images from the wireless camera, create WIFI hotspot 4K CCTV Installation Tester With Cable Testing Function ● RJ45 cable TDR test, test cable pair status, length, attenuation, reflectivity, impedance, skew etc ● Improvement cable tester, UTP cable, telephone cable etc order and connectivity test, can save testing report, if special number, need customized Multifunctional Touch Screen Security Cameras Tester Monitor ● 10/100/1000M Ethernet, network state and traffic display ● Wrist design, portable and easier to carry ● TesterPlay: Tester, android version mobile phone, PC display at the same time ● Network tool: PING test, IP address scan, port flashing etc ● Drop-down menu, can select Poe power, IP setting, CVBS, LAN info etc ● Self -update software, you can install apps with android version ● Media player, 4K video files and MKV/MP4 media files play ● Display its genuine resolution of the IP camera images ● PTZ control supports more than 30 protocols such as PELCO-P, PELCO-D, and SAMSUNG ● Audio in, support record and save the audio/LED lamp, calculators, music players and other application tools ● 7.4 V /2400mAh Lithium-Ion Polymer Battery, after 4~5 hours charging, working time lasts 7 hours
